text: LIFE IS JUST PURELY WONDERFUL OUT HERE!
I also have some exiting news! The director of Venom said we two can be watching the Venom3 premier as the very first audience!
OMG YES! I love Kesha! She's the most adorable female singer ever! I need to go!
Hey Kesha just called me to ask if you'd like to go to her concert tour at Goldengate park next week, she said she arranged you VIP seat.
Sure thing! But dont drink lotta beer, otherwise i might not be able to drive you home later on
Can we go to Andrew Garfield's house tonight watching World Cup???!! I'm so excited!
I did! She said she was glad that I have read her book and hope i like it!
Sure Thing! Have fun! Also did you share your reading review of Constance Wu's new book with her?
Scarlett, Avatar2 movie is coming out, can I go with Harley and Ivy this Friday?
It was amazing barbeques! And the Blake couple were so nice to me! We even sang some karaokes afterthat!
btw, how was the barbeque diner with Blake and Ryan? Did they invite you to their luxury mansion?
That sounds great! I think you should definitely schedule for another appointment with Dr.Jason Yu, he really is a good therapist.
Hey Scarlett! Thank you so much!
